[**What is Angular?** \\
\\
Angular is the web development framework for building modern apps!\\
\\
Learn more](https://angular.dev/tutorials/learn-angular/overview) [**Angular's Roadmap** \\
\\
Read about Angular's open source roadmap including current, future and accomplished projects.\\
\\
Learn more](https://angular.dev/tutorials/learn-angular/roadmap) [**Playground** \\
\\
Play with Angular in your browser!\\
\\
Start playing](https://angular.dev/tutorials/learn-angular/playground) [**Angular YouTube Course** \\
\\
Check out the official Angular YouTube channel for videos, courses and more!\\
\\
Start learning](https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PL1w1q3fL4pmj9k1FrJ3Pe91EPub2_h4jF)
